lines.value: elio de angelis 26 mairch 1958 - 15 mey 1986 wis an italian racin driver who pairticipatit in formula ane atween 1979 an 1986 racin for the shadow lotus an brabham teams
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis killed durin testin at the paul ricard circuit at le castellet in 1986
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: elio de angelis wis a competitive an hichtlie popular presence durin the formula ane circus o the 1980s an is sometimes referred tae as formula ane's last gentleman player
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: during tests at the paul ricard circuit in fraunce the rear wing o his bt55 detached at hicht speed resulting in the caur losin downforce on the rear wheels which instigated a cartwheel ower a sidetrack barrier and causing the car to catch fire
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the impact itself did not kill de angelis but he was unable to extract himself from the car unassisted
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the situation wis exacerbatit bi the lack o track marshals on the circuit who coud hae providit him wi emergency assistance
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a 30 minute delay ensued afore a helicopter arrived an de angelis dee'd 29 hours later at the hospital in marseille where he haed been taken frae smoke inhalation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his actual crash impact injuries wur ae a broken collar bone an licht burns on his back
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the tragic circumstances of his daith weighed heavily on the sport's conscience an radical changes wur introduced bi then preses jean marie balestre in the months follaein his accident which ultimately heraldit the end o the turbo pouered era in formula ane racin

lines.value: william henry quilliam apryle 10 1856 - 1932 who changed his name tae abdullah quilliam wis a 19t century convert frae christianity tae islam noted for foondin ingland's first mosque an islamic centre
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: william quilliam wis born in liverpool tae a wealthy manx faimily in 1856
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his faither robert quilliam wis a watch manufacturer
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: william wis educated at the liverpool institute an king william's college on the isle o man
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he began work as a solicitor in 1878
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: quilliam wis brought up a christian but learned aboot islam an converted aither while visitin southren france in 1882 an crossing ower tae algerie an tunisie or efter visitin morocco in 1887
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: returning tae liverpool he began tae promote islam in breetain as abdullah quilliam
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: quilliam established the liverpool muslim institute at 8 brougham terrace west derby street liverpool in 1889 openin on christmas day
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this wis ingland's first mosque accommodating aroond a hunder muslims this wis followed bi a muslim college headed bi haschem wilde an nasrullah warren which offered courses for baith muslims an non muslims

lines.value: a weekly debatin an leeterar society within the college attracted non muslims
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: quilliam influenced the paths o ither converts includin his formerly methodist mither his sons an scientists an intellectuals an his ensaumple lead tae the conversion o ower 150 inglismen tae islam
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: quilliam wis influential in advancin knowledge o islam within the unitit kinrick an gained ither converts throu his leeterar wirks an the charitable institutions he foondit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: an active writer an essayist he produced a weekly paper the crescent frae 1893 until 1908
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he published three editions o his the faith o islam which wis translated intae thirteen leids gainin him fame across the islamic warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he haed extensive contact wi englis spikin wast african muslims an toured the region's coastal ceeties on his wey tae lagos tae attend the festivities surroonding the consecration o the shitta bey mosque in 1894
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he received mony honours frae the leaders o the islamic warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis appyntit sheikh al islam bi the ottoman sultan abdul hamid ii in 1894 an persie consul tae liverpool bi the shah
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: echtteen months later the new caur went intae production badged as the triumph acclaim an based on the honda ballade
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the end o dolomite an tr7 production meant that the acclaim wis the anerlie caur tae wear the triumph badge efter 1981
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the acclaim wis significant as the first essentially japanese caur tae be biggit athin the european economic community nou the european union tae bypass japan's voluntary leemit o 11% mercat o the tot nummer o european sales
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the acclaim wis an aa a major turnaround pynt for bl itself wi the caur sportin guid reliability an big quality frae the ootset
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it paved the wey for the honda based rover badged range o caurs whilk bl an successor organisations austin rover an rover group wad develop throughout the 1980s an 1990s
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the maist notable ootward chynge frae the honda wis the appearance o a central badge on the grille
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at the time the japanese model haed honda tae the right haund side o the grille
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ither chynges includit twin keihin carburettors the ballade anerlie haed a single carburettor the mirrors wur situate on the doors the independent front an rear macpherson strut suspension wis tweaked for the uk mercat an the seats wur based on ford cortina frames
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the acclaim wis providit in a mair luxurious interior trim nor its honda equivalent even in its base models
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the brakes wur disc at the front an drum at the rear
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: aw acclaims wur powered bi the transverse mounted aw alloy an owerheid cam 1335 cc ingine foond in the honda civic drivin the front wheels throu a five speed manual gearbox or a three speed trio matic whilk wis a manually selectable automatic transmission gearbox whilk wis the same as the hondamatic an the interior wis nearly identical except for the seats
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the uisual bl trim levels wur offered l hl hls an the tap o the range cd whilk haed front an rear electric windaes chrome bumpers headlamp washers 165/70 tyres caurs up tae the hls haed 155/80 tyres plastic wheel trims velour upholstery wi seat pockets on the back o the front seats an optional air conditioning
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the caur remained largely the same throughout its production life
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a mark 2 version o the acclaim came oot in 1983 frae vi no

lines.value: 180415 onwards

lines.value: the main chynges wur tae the exterior door handles the clock a restyled steerin wheel a restyled gear knob the rear interior door handles thay wur juist swapped an the heater recirculation control whilk wis muived
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mark 2 hl an hls caurs wur better equipped nor the earlier anes
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thare wis a leemitit edition avon acclaim whilk haed leather seats wi pipin tae match the body colour leather door panels widden dashboard widden door cappings twa tone metallic paint colour coded wheels wi chrome embellishers chrome plated grille colour coded headlamp surrounds vinyl ruif an extra soundproofing
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thare wis an aa an avon turbo whilk haed lunar alloy wheels wi 205/60 tyres suede upholstery front air dam side decals an a turbo technics turbocharger whilk increased pouer tae 105 bhp frae the standard 70 bhp it is thocht that thare ar anerlie fower survivin avon turbos includin the press caur whilk wis an aa the first avon turbo
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the acclaim replaced the triumph dolomite o the 1970s an wis succeeded bi the first rover 200-series based on the next incarnation o the honda ballade

lines.value: it wis the last caur tae wear the triumph badge

lines.value: the last acclaim off the production line is nou in the heritage motor centre

lines.value: in 1982 an 1983 it featurt in the tap ten sellin caurs in breetain the first triumph tae achieve this feat syne records began in 1965

lines.value: a tot o 133625 acclaims wur produced the vast majority o whilk wur selt in breetain

lines.value: production finisht in the simmer o 1984 whan the rover 200 wis launched an the acclaim's demise saw the end o the triumph marque as austin rover's restructurin saw anerlie the austin rover an mg marques bein retained
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: an urban myth surroonds the caur in that it wis claimed it wad hae tae be rebadged for the german mercat as the name triumph acclaim translates tae sieg heil in german

lines.value: in truth the acclaim wis anerlie sauld in germany tae breetish servicemen an weemen based in germany throu the naafi

lines.value: ptolemy vi philometor greek , ptolemaios philomá¸tor ca 186 145 bc wis a keeng o egyp frae the ptolemaic period
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he reigned frae 180 tae 145 bc.ptolemy succeedit in 180 at the age o aboot 6 an ruled jointly wi his mither cleopatra i till her daith in 176 bc the follaein year he mairit his sister cleopatra ii
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 170 bc antiochus iv began the saxt sirian war an invaded egyp twice
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis crouned as its keeng in 168 but abandoned his claim on the orders o the roman senate
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: frae 169 164 egyp wis ruled bi a triumvirate consistin o ptolemy his sister queen an his younger brither kent as ptolemy viii physcon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 164 he wis driven oot bi his brither an went tae roum tae seek support which he received frae cato
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis restored the follaein year bi the intervention o the alexandrians an ruled uneasily cruelly suppressin frequent rebellions
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 152 bc he briefly ruled jointly wi ane o his sons kent as ptolemy eupator but it is thocht that ptolemy eupator dee'd that same year
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: heidevolk's name translates in scots as fowk o the heath land

lines.value: heidevolk wis foondit unner the name hymir in 2002 bi sax men inspired bi nature germanic meethology folklore an the history o gelderland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: they haed a common desire tae create muisic that intended tae capture their fascination for these subjects

lines.value: the baund started performin live in 2003

lines.value: ever since 2003 the baund haes released ane demo three full length studio albums an ane ep.their third album uit oude grond wis released tae generally positive critical acclaim wi ane writer callin the album a hugely enjoyable release combinin aggressive metallic riffage with tastefully entwined traditional fowk instrumentation an melody

lines.value: the andamanese leids form a proposed leid family spoken bi the andamanese peoples o the andaman islands a union territory o indie whose validity is disputed

lines.value: there ar twa clear families o andamanese leids great andamanese an ongan plus sentinelese which is unknown an therefore unclassifiable

lines.value: blessed hildegard o bingen german:hildegard von bingen latin:hildegardis bingensis 1098 - 17 september 1179 also kentn as saunt hildegard an sibyl o the rhine wis a christian mystic german benedictine abbess visionary an polymath
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: electit a magistra by her fellow nuns in 1136 she foondit the monasteries o rupertsberg in 1150 an eibingen in 1165
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ane o her works as a composer the ordo virtutum is an early example o liturgical drama
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: saunt joan o arc or the maid o orleans (, ; ca 1412 - 30 mey 1431 is considered a naitional heroine o fraunce an a catholic saunt
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a paisant lassie born in eastren fraunce wha claimed divine guidance she led the french airmy tae several important veectories in the hunder years war whilk paved the wey for the coronation o charles vii
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: she wis captured bi the burgundians sauld tae the inglis tried bi an ecclesiastical court an burnt on a stab whan she wis nineteen year auld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: .twintie-five year efter the justifeecation pope callixtus iii examint the trial pronouncit her innocent an declarit her a martyr
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: she wis beeteefit in 1909 an canonised in 1920
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: she is alang wi st denis st martin o tours st louis ix an st theresa of lisieux ane o the patron saints of fraunce

lines.value: the ford mainline is an automobile which wis produced bi the ford motor company in the unitit states in the models years 1952 tae 1956
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis introduced as the base trim level o the 1952 ford range belaw the customline an crestline models
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the mainline retained its poseetion in the redesigned 1955 ford range but wis dropped for the 1957 model year when the ford custom became the new base model
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the mainline wis offered in 2 door sedan 4 door sedan 2 door coupe an 2 door station wagon body styles
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the station wagon wis marketit as the mainline ranch wagon till it lost its mainline tag for the 1955 model year when aw ford wagons wur moved tae thair awn series
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mainlines wur available wi baith inline sax cylinder an v8 ingines
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in australie the mainline name wis applee'd tae a locally developed 2 door coupe utility version o the ford customline sedan frae 1952
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the mainline utilized an imported ford v8 convertible chassis wi an additional cross member for additional load carrying strength
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it sauld alongside the australian biggit customline sedan wi baith gien yearly updates until production ceased in 1959
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the mainline utility wis powered bi an australian produced version o the ford side valve v8 engine until the introduction o the ohv v8 in the redesigned 1955 series

lines.value: robert burns 25 januar 1759 in allowa ayrshire - 21 julie 1796 in dumfries cawed robbie or rabbie burns an aw is the naitional poet o scotland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wrate in scots wi whiles some inglis influence
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he is widely kent as the naitional makar o scotland an his wark is celebrate aw ower the warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: athort the warld he is the best kent o the mony makars that haes wrocht in the scots leid tho he forby screived mony poems in inglis an in a kynd o licht scots that can be eithly read by fowk nae sae acquaint wi scots within an furth o scotland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: burns is aften regairdit as a pioneer o the romantic muivment an efter his daith he became a seembol an important springheid o inspiration tae the foonders o baith leiberalism an socialism
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he haes become a cultural icon o scotland an aw baith in scotland itsel an amang scots that haes flittit tae fremmit airts
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: forby his ain componins burns ingaitherit fowk sangs frae athort scotland an aw aften revisin or adaptin thaim
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the best kent o thir is auld lang syne that's lilted at hogmanay an scots wha hae that haes whiles been saw as a naitional anthem for scotland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ithir poems an sangs o his that byde weel kent athort the warld the day include a red red rose a man's a man for a that to a louse to a mouse the battle of sherramuir an ae fond kiss
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: robert burns wis born twa mile sooth o ayr in allowa the auldest o seiven weans o william burness 1721-1744 robert chynged the spellin o his name tae burns in 1786 that wes a sel eddicated fermer frae dunnottar an agnes broun 1732-1820 that wis the dochter o a fermer frae kirkoswald
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: robert wis born intae a hoose that his faither haed biggit nou the burns cottage museum whaur he bydit intil easter 1766 whan he wis seiven year auld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: william burness selt the hoose an teuk the tenancy o the 70-acre munt oliphant ferm sootheast o allowa
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: here burns growed up in puirtith an hairdskip an the teuch haund wark o the ferm left traces in a premature stoup an a weakened constitution
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the young burns haed but a tait o raiglar schuilin an teuk muckle o his eddicatin frae his faither that teachit his bairns readin writin arithmatic geography an history forby screivin fer thaim a manual of christian belief
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis teachit by john murdoch an aw that apent a schuil in allowa in 1763 an techit laitin french an mathematics tae baith robert an his brither gilbert frae 1765 tae 1768 till murdoch quat the pairish
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter twa thrie year o hame eddication burns wis sent tae dalrymple parish schuil durin the simmer o 1772 ere retourin at hairst time tae fou time ferm darg till 1773 whan he wes sent tae wone wi murdoch fer thrie week tae study grammar french an laitin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: by the eild o 15 burns wes the heidmaist darger at munt oliphant
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin the hairst o 1774 he wis assistit by nelly kilpatrick 1759-1820 that tiftit his first attempt at poesy o once i lov'd a bonnie lass
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the simmer o 1775 he wis sent tae feinish his eddication wi a tutor at kirkowswald whaur he met wi peggy thomson tae wham he wrate twa sangs now westling winds an i dreamed i lay
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at whitsun 1777 william burness remuivit his lairge faimily frae the fashfou condeetions o munt oliphant fer the 130-acre ferm at lochlea near tarbolton whaur they bydit until burness daith in 1784
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efterhaun the faimily became integratit intae the community o tarbolton
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: tae his faither's disapproval robert jyned a kintra dancin schuil in 1779 an wi gilbert shappit the tarbolton bachelor's club the follaein year
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1781 burns became a freemason at lodge st david tarbolton
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his earliest existin letters date frae this time whan be begoud makkin romantic overtures tae alison begbie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: despite fower sangs screived for her an a suggestion that he wis wullin tae mairry on her she rejectit him
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in december 1781 burns flittit for a wee tae irvine tae leir tae become a flax dresser but durin the hogmanay celebrations o 1781/2 the flax shap caucht fire an wis daimiged eneuch tae send him hame tae lochlea ferm
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he cairriet on screivin poems an sangs an begoud a commonplace beuk in 1783 while his faither focht a legal argie bargie wi his landlaird
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the case gaed tae the coort o session an burness wis uphaudit in januar 1784 a fortnicht ere he dee'd
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: robert an gilbert made an ineffectual strauchle tae keip on the ferm but efter it failt thay flittit tae the ferm at mossgiel near mauchline in mairch that thay haudit on tae wi a sair fecht for the neist fower year
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin the simmer o 1784 he cam tae ken a curn o lassies kent thegither as the belles o mauchline ane o wham wis jean armour the dochter o a stanemason frae mauchline
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: burns casual luve affairs an houghmagandie didna endear him tae the elders o the local kirk an creatit for him a name for dissolution amang his neebours
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his first illegitimate bairn elizabeth paton burns 1785-1817 wis born tae his mithir's servand elizabeth paton as he wis stairtin oot on a relationship wi jean armour
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: she buir him twins in 1786 an tho her faither wis agin thair mairrage at first thay wis mairriet in 1788
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: she buir him nine bairns in aw but ainlie thrie won past infancy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin his relationship wi jean armour in 1786 an as his prospecks in fermin dwynit he begoud an amour wi mary campbell tae wham he dedicatit the poems the highland lassie o highland mary an to mary in heaven
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thair relationship haes been the subjeck o muckle jalousin an it haes been suggestit that thay micht hae mairriet
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thay ettled tae flit tae jamaicae whaur burns ettled tae wark as a beuk keeper on a plantation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis dissuadit by a letter frae thomas blacklock an ere the plans coud be actit upo campbell dee'd o a suddentie o a fever in greenock
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: that simmer he set furth the first o his collections o poesy poems chiefly in the scottish dialect that creatit a sensation an haes been recognisit as a signeeficact leeterar event
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at the suggestion o his brither robert burns set furth his poems in a vollum cawed poems chiefly in the scottish dialect kent as the kilmarnock edition an aw
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: first proposals wis pitten oot in apryle 1786 or the poems wis at lang an last setten furth in kilmarnock in july 1786 an selt for 3 shillin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: brocht oot by john wilson a local prenter in kilmarnock it haed muckle o burns best writin includin the twa dogs address to the deil hallowe'en the cotter's saturday night to a mouse an to a mountain daisy mony o whilk haed been scrieved at mossgiel ferm
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the wark wis a speed straucht awa an burns wis suin weel kent aw ower the kintra
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis inveetit tae edinburgh on 14t december 1786 tae owersee the preperation o a reveesit edeetion the first edinburgh edeetion by william creech that wis finally setten furth on 17t apryle 1787 athin ae week o this burns selt his copyricht tae creech fer 100 guineas
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in edinburgh he wis taen in as an equal by the ceety's weel kent leeterati an wis a guest at upper cless gaitherins whaur he buir himsel wi unaffecktit mense
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: here he met wi an made a lastin impression on the 16-year auld walter scott that later descrievit him wi great admiration ::"'his person wis strang an robust his mainers landwart nae clounish a sort o mensfu plainness an simpleecity that aiblins teuk in pairt o its effect frae knawledge o his stoundin talents
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his featurs is presentit in mr nasmyth's pictur but tae me is gies ower the norrie that they wis dimeenshed as if saw in perspective
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: i jalouse his countenance wis mair muckle nae it kythes in ony o the limns...thare wis a strang expression o cannyness in aw his lineaments the ee alane i dout indicatit the makarly chairacter an temperment
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis lairge an o a daurk cast an leeterally glowed whan he spak wi feelin or intrest
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: i ne'er saw anither sic ee in a human heid tho i hae seen the maist kenspeckle chiels o ma time his stay in the ceety resultit in some life lang freendships amang whilk wis thaim wi laird glencairn an frances anna dunlop that wis whiles his sponsor wha wi he correspondit for the lave o his life
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he begoud a relationship wi the seperatit agnes nancy mclehose wi whit he exchynged passionate luve letters unner bynames burns cawed himsel sylvander an nancy clarinda
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: whan it became clear that nancy wadna be easily wooed intae a pheesical relationship burns muived on tae jenny clow nancy's hoose servand that buir him a son robert burns clow in 1788
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his relationship wi nancy endit in 1791 wi a hintmaist meetin in edinburgh afore she sailt tae jamaica for whit transpired tae be a short lived reconcilin wi her estrynged guidman
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ere she quat scotland he gied her the manuscript o ae fond kiss as a fareweel tae her
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in edinburgh in the winter o 1787 he met wi james johnson a strauchlin muisic engraver an muisic seller wi a luve o auld scots sangs an a determination tae preserve thaim
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: burns skared this intrest an became an enthusiastic contreebutor tae the scots musical museum
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the first vollum o this wis setten furth in 1787 an includit three sangs by burns
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he contributit fowerty sangs tae vollum ii an wad end up sponsible for aboot a third o the sax hunder sangs in the hail ingaitherin as weel as makkin a conseederable editorial contreebution
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the hintmaist vollum wis setten furth in 1803
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: whan he retoured tae ayrshire on 18t februar 1788 he resumed his relationship wi jean armour an teuk a lease on the ferm o ellisland near dumfries on 18t mairch settlin there on 11t juin but trained as an exciseman shoud fermin conteena tae pruive unsuccessfu
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis appyntit duties in customs an excise in 1789 an gied up the ferm in 1791
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: meanwhile he wis aye scrievin awa at his best an in november 1790 haed feenisht tam o shanter
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: aboot this time he wis offered an turnt doun an appyntment in lunnon on the staff o the star newspaper an refuised tae become a canditate for a newly creatit chair o agricultur in the varsity o edinburgh awtho influential freends offert tae uphaud his claims
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter giein up his ferm he flittit tae dumfries
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis at this time that bein aksed tae scrieve leerics for the melodies of scotland he respondit by contreebutin ower 100 sangs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he made major contreebutions tae george thomson's a select collection of original scottish airs for the voice as weel as tae james johnson's the scots musical museum
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: argiably his claim tae immortality chiefly rests on thir vollums that pit him in the front raing o leeric makars
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: burns descrieved hou he haed tae maister the tuin or he componed the wirds ::"'ma wey is a conseeder the makarly sentiment correspondent tae ma norrie o the muisical expression syne wale ma theme begin ae stanza whan thon is componed that's for ordinar the maist fykie pairt o the business a walk oot sit doun nou an than leuk oot for objects in naitur aboot me that's in unison or hairmony wi the cogitations o ma fancy an wirkins o ma bosom hummin ilka nou an than the air wi the verses i hae framed
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: whan i feel ma muse beginnin tae jaud i retire tae the solitar ingle side o ma study an there pit ma effuisions doun on paper sweengin at intervals on the hint legs o ma elbae cheer by wey o cawin furth ma ain creetical stricturs as ma pen gaes burns wrocht tae gaither an preserve auld scots fowk sangs an aw whiles revisin eikin tae an adaptin thaim
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ane o the better kent o thair gaitherins is the merry muses of caledonia the title's no burns an ingaitherin o clarty leerics that wis kenspeckle in the muisic haws o scotland as late as the 20t century
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mony o burns maist fawmous poems is sangs wi the muisic based upo aulder tradeetional sangs for ensaumple auld lang syne is setten tae a tradeetional tuin cawed can ye labour lea a red red rose is setten tae major graham an the battle of sherramuir is setten tae the cameronian rant
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: burns direct leeterar influences in the uise o scots in poesy wis allan ramsay an robert fergusson
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: burns wark teuk tift frae a guid kennin o clessical biblical an inglis leeteratur an aw as weel as the scots makar tradeetion an the fowk poetry that he kent frae his bairnheid
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis skeily in uissin scots an scots inglis aften a mixter maxter o the twa
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: writtin in the inglis leid or in a licht by leid version o scots gied him a readership furth o scotland alloued him tae chynge frae ane till anither for effect as in his uise o inglis for the moralisin pairts o tam o shanter or gin he wis needin the rhyme
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his themes includit republicanism he livit durin the time o the french revolution an radicalism that expressit in scots wha hae scots paitriotism anticlericism cless inequalities gender roles commentary on the scots kirk o his time scots cultural identity puirtith sexuality an the guid side o popular socialisin carousin whisky fowk sangs etc
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: burns an his warks wis a source o inspiration tae the pioneers o leeberalism socialism an the darg for scots sel govrenment an he is still widely respectit an aften quotit by poleetical activists the day e'en by conservatives an estaiblishment feegurs acause syne his daith burns became drawn intae the fabric o scots naitional identity
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thanks tae his intervention napoleon in a letter delivered tae gaspard monge scientist an commissary o the french govrenment for science an airt promised tae guarantee an pertect the unthirldom o the republic afferin tae extend its territory accordin tae its needs

lines.value: durin warld war i when italy declared war on austrick hungary on 23 mey 1915 san marino remained neutral an italy adoptit a hostile view o sammarinese neutrality suspectin that san marino coud harbor austrian spies who coud be gien access tae its new radiotelegraph station

lines.value: efter its reestablishment as constantinople in 330 ce it served as an imperial caipital for awmaist 16 centuries during the roman an byzantine 330-1204 an 1261 1453 the laitin 1204-1261 an the ottoman 1453-1922 empires

lines.value: the banner of uzbekistan () wis approved at the seivent extraordinary session o the supreme council o the republic o uzbekistan on november 18 1991
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: accordin tae the uzbek embassy the state flag o the republic o uzbekistan wis approved at the seventh extraordinary session o the supreme council o the republic o uzbekistan on november 18 1991
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the state flag an its symbols portray the heestorical links wi states which hae existit in the past wi'in the borders o modern uzbekistan an embodies in itself the naitional an cultural traditions o the republic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: 1 the color blue on the flag is a seembol o the eternal sky an life givin water which reflect the essence o life
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in seembolic leid it represents guidness wisdom honesty glory an loyalty
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: consequently the color o amir temur's state flag wis also blue
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: 2 the color white on the flag seembolizin holy peace harmonizes wi the illumination o the day an the sources o licht in the universe
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the color white is a seembol o purity transparency innocence the cleanliness f desires an dreams an a strivin for inner beauty
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: 3 the color green is a seembol o the renewal o nature
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in quite a few naitions it is considered tae be a seembol o youth hope an joy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: 4 the red stripes ar tributaries o the pouer o life that flows in oor bodies
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: 5 the depiction o a youthful crescent moon is connectit wi oor heestorical traditions
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at the same time it is a seembol o the independence which we hae obtained
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: 6 stars ar considered a spiritual divine symbol for all naitions
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the 12 stars depictit on the state flag o the republic o uzbekistan ar also directly connectit wi oor heestorical traditions wi the ancient calendar cycle o the sun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: oor attention tae the 12 stars is also explained bi the development o astronomy in the scientific thought o the ancient states wi'in the borders o uzbekistan
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is necessary tae unnerstand the depiction o 12 stars on oor state flag as a seembol o the antiquity o the culture o the uzbek people its maturity an the strivin for happiness in its land

lines.value: anawrahta minsaw (, ; 1015 1078 wis the foonder o the pagan empire
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: considered the maist important burmese monarch bi historians anawrahta turned a sma principality in the dry zone o upper burma intae the first burmese empire that formed the basis o modren day burma myanmar
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: historically verifiable burmese history begins wi his ascension tae the pagan throne in 1044
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: anawrahta unified the entire irrawaddy valley for the first time in history an placed peripheral regions sic as shan states an arakan northern rakhine unner pagan's suzerainty
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he successfully stopped the advance o khmer empire intae tenasserim coastline an intae upper menam valley makkin pagan ane o twa main kinrick in mainland sootheast asie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a strict disciplinarian anawrahta implementit a series o key social releegious an economic reforms that woud hae a lastin impact in burmese history
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his social an releegious reforms later developed intae the modren day burmese cultur
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bi biggin a series o weirs he turned parched arid regions aroond pagan intae the main rice granaries o upper burma gien upper burma an endurin economic base frae which tae dominate the irrawaddy valley an its periphery in the follaein centuries
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he bequeathed a strang administrative seestem that aw later pagan keengs follaed till the dynasty's fall in 1287
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the success an longevity o pagan's dominance ower the irrawaddy valley laid the foondation for the ascent o burmese leid an cultur the spread of burman ethnicity in upper burma
lines.name: Scots
